text:
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
555 Madison Avenue
New York, N. Y. 10022
(212) 5S2-2020
July 1, 1969
Mr. William J. Harley
President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington D.C. 20036
Dear Mr. Harley:
I am pleased to enclose a check in the amount of $32,500.00
representing the July 1, 1969 payment for financial assistance
to expand the activities of the National. Educational Radio
Network.
This financial assistance is made pursuant to the letter
dated February 53 1969 from Frank Pace, Jr. to yourself.
Richard J. ylavell
Business Manager
RJC:ro
Enel.
